Detailed Description

The file implements the sensor management. Sensors can be started or stopped by either the GPIO Switch or through the CLI.

enum MmwDemo_SensorEvent_e

Millimeter Wave Demo Sensor Event.

The enumeration is used to define the sensor events used in mmwDemo

Enumerator
MmwDemo_SensorEvent_START 

mmwDemo Sensor start event

MmwDemo_SensorEvent_STOP 

mmwDemo Sensor stop event

MmwDemo_SensorEvent_FRAME_START 

mmwDemo Sensor frame start event

MmwDemo_SensorEvent_KEY_PRESS 

mmwDemo key press event

MmwDemo_SensorEvent_BSS_STOP

MmwDemo_SensorEvent_DATAPATH_STOP 

mmwDemo data path stop event

MmwDemo_SensorEvent_MAX 

mmwDemo maximum event

Definition at line 218 of file sensor_mgmt.c.

enum MmwDemo_SensorState_e

Millimeter Wave Demo Sensor State.

The enumeration is used to define the sensor states used in mmwDemo

Enumerator
MmwDemo_SensorState_INIT 

mmwDemo Sensor INIT state. This is the inital state after sensor is initialized.

MmwDemo_SensorState_START 

mmwDemo Sensor START state. This is the state after sensor is started through mmwave_start()

MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP_PENDING 

mmwDemo Sensor STOP PEDNING state. This is the state after sensor is stopped through mmwave_stop(), and waiting for all modules(such as datapath, Bss etc) to reach full stop state.

MmwDemo_SensorState_STOP 

mmwDemo Sensor STOP state. This is the state that radar sensor including all its componets reach stop state.

MmwDemo_SensorState_MAX 

mmwDemo Sensor maximum supported state.

Definition at line 176 of file sensor_mgmt.c.
